logEvent

void logEvent(Analytics.Category category,
              String action)
Log an event with a given sampleRate, range [0.0 - 1.0).

Parameters:
category - the analytics Analytics.Category
action - the action for the event, e.g. "Play"

logEvent

void logEvent(Analytics.Category category,
              String action,
              String label,
              int value)
Log an event with a given sampleRate, range [0.0 - 1.0).

Parameters:
category - the analytics Analytics.Category
action - the action for the event, e.g. "Play"
label - descriptor for the event
value - value associated with the event. You can see your event values in the Overview, Categories, and Actions reports, where they are listed by event or aggregated across events, depending upon your report view
